Html:
I have install the WPP 1.3.1407.11, i can connected to the WSUS server. but i can not connected to the client. In the wpp it showing the client is not install , when i it detectnow. it show that the client connected failure and Reset "No Ping". i have already check in the Cert that export from
the server. and i also add the dword "AcceptTrustedPublisherCerts=1 in client Regedit HKLM.
Any body help me to fix this issues?

CHANKALOK888 wrote:
I have install the WPP 1.3.1407.11, i can connected to the WSUS server. but i can not connected to the client. In the wpp it showing the client is not install , when i it detectnow. it show that the client connected failure and Reset "No Ping". i have already check in the Cert that export from
the server. and i also add the dword "AcceptTrustedPublisherCerts=1 in client Regedit HKLM.
Any body help me to fix this issues?
For me it is a problem on the client. Check Firewall and Antivirus Software on the Client.

Sorry, i Have already checked that the client PC can show in the WPP with "unkown" not for "Not Install" status

i have drop down part of the log as below where the client PC is "news350.newsdept.local" running in Win XP sp 3
any help?
